Warlord

Destiny Playbook

You have become the ruler of the battlefield, the queen of combat, the king of tactics and strategy, and nothing will get in your way.

Requirements

To become the Warlord, you must earn the Fellowship of the Heir's people.

The Warlord starts with The Warrior's Path.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.the-warlord.Item.EOLaKGdRA2KBzIXm]{The warrior's path}

Advancement

When you Level Up, choose one Advancement from either this list or from your Basic Playbook, then mark it. You may only choose each option once.

  • Take the Heir's Core Moves (Royal Treatment and Yes, My Liege). If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
  • Take an Heir's Custom.
  • Take a Warlord Custom.
  • Take a Warlord Custom.
  • Take a Warlord Custom.
